scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const root=process.cwd(); const out=path.join(root,'public'); fs.rmSync(out,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(out,{recursive:true}); const copy=(p)=>{const src=path.join(root,p); if(!fs.existsSync(src)) return; fs.cpSync(src,path.join(out,p),{recursive:true});}; ['assets','pages','forms','blog','seo'].forEach(copy); ['index.html','robots.txt','sitemap.xml'].forEach(copy); console.log('Built static output to', out);"
